name: Bounce Remastered
description:
Nokia's Bounce, remastered using Godot.

Only 1st level currently available due to bug on the 2nd

Arrow key to move and jump.
Avoid 'candle' and reach the finish line.
CAUTION: The ball might bounce wildly, proceed with caution

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
What Makes This Game Special ?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. First attempt to remaster using Godot.
2. I make all the assets myself.
3. Sorry, no .exe file (Godot export malfunction)

Github Page:
https://github.com/troydarksword/bounce_remastered
